response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me and is worth $1,500,000 to me personally. Given its significance, I am offering it to you at a special price, which I believe is highly competitive and reflective of its true worth. I am extending this offer at a price of $1,300,000. This is a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a premium yet favorable cost. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 1300000}
